title: [LFM] Jamaican Hopscotch Mafia LF Two More!
body:
**OPENING:**
Pretty much title says it all (Except for the team name, That was kind of a joke), We are just a group of real life friends who play 3s weekly but are looking to expand to Summoners Rift and currently have an Unranked team. We are planning on playing at least one or two games a night. We are a Casual team and there will be nights where we don't play at all but we will aim for a quota of 5-10 ranked games a week. We will have a group skype chat where we will communicate.

**Days and Times:  (ALL TIMES ARE AEST)**

**(MONDAY/TUESDAY/FRIDAY/SATURDAY)**
Since one of our core players works in the mines, His hours are not set in stone and could turn up any time between the hours of 4-7PM and some times even later. We will try to aim for a 5PM Start time so we are requiring you to be online around that time. 
**(WEDNESDAY/THURSDAY/SUNDAY)**
I raid between the hours of 8-11 on these days in World of Warcraft so I am unavailable during those hours.

**What we are looking for:**
1. A Duo Bot Lane
2. Marksman
3. Support
4. Jungle (Our jungler will switch roles)
5. Mid Lane (Our Mid Lane will switch roles)

**What you Require:**
We require you to have a Microphone/Headset. We currently use Skype to communicate so we also require you to use it with us and communicate with your voice.  We also require you to have knowledge of the role you are wishing to play and be able to play more then one or two champions in that role. 

**Ranks:**
Your solo Queue rank doesnt really matter, But we would prefer you be either Silver or Higher and/or have previous ranked team history.

**CLOSING:**
If you are interested in trailing in any of the roles mentioned above don't be afraid of posting bellow or adding me for a chat in game, Just make sure to mention what you play (Role) and favourite champions.

replies.body: I'm Bronze 1 and i main support sona my problem is i raid friday sunday monday in wow so id only be availiable for 2 nights

yo im sad that the name was a joke cause my name lol (jamaican222) but can I join im only b3 but im stuck there cause of elo hell is crap but I do have Skype and communication is key, my playing times for lol is 4:00 - 8:30 and all day on weekends
 my jg main is {{champion:254}}  my adc mains are {{champion:236}}  and{{champion:67}} my top main is{{champion:31}}  and support is {{champion:12}}and {{champion:201}}  and finally my mid laner {{champion:103}}
Add meh, I ams Korean Challenjour Smurf cousin.
